author: Gemma-Louise Sharman 🇺🇦
text: Visiting Claude Monet house is on my to-do-list. The chap has only been my inspiration since I became captivated by his 'Water Lily Pond' painting that hung nicely on my aunts bathroom wall when I was eight. #art #artist #claudemonet

author: Gemma-Louise Sharman 🇺🇦
text:
The new #Mulan was intriguing, good action and storyline. 

However, the original 1998 version, will always be my favourite. As the new one removed the musical element and one of the greatest characters, Mushu. #Movies #DisneyPlus #Disney

author: Gemma-Louise Sharman 🇺🇦
text: Not seeing your friend for more than a few years, then meeting up and picking up where you left off. Is what I personally call a good friendship. 🥺🌻

text: People need to stop saying white privilege doesn't exist, because it does! It's wrong and disgusting, stop murdering innocent black people! Stop with the f*cking racism, we're all human, it's time people open their eyes to that! #BlackLivesMatter

author: Gemma-Louise Sharman 🇺🇦
text: It's really frustrating to see people bullying models on social media, just because of their size. If you don't like something, don't comment, simple. It's very disheartening to see such vile comments, plus-size or average size we're all human. #StopTheHate
